attributes.action: Amend/scrap the bill that will stop the boats
attributes.additional_details: Because I've read the current bill and it is obviously designed to keep these people out of the uk,  rather than help peopke who are fleeing for their lives
attributes.background: Stop appealing to racists in this country regarding asylum seekers. Provide the network to allow people in, and fast track their applications, which is the root cause of the delay in assessing these people's cases. In the meantime accept all asylum seekers, whichever route they take

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634311
